name: North Seattle Transfer Station
description: Accepts a variety of recyclables including metals, plastics, and paper.

name: South Transfer Station
description: Offers recycling services for plastics, glass, and electronic waste.

name: Seattle Public Utilities - Hazardous Waste Collection
description: Collection site for hazardous materials like chemicals, batteries, and paint.

name: CleanScapes Recycling Center
description: Drop-off center for general recyclables, including cardboard and aluminum cans.

name: Goodwill Seattle - Electronics Recycling
description: Accepts various electronics and small appliances for recycling.

name: Total Reclaim Seattle
description: Specializes in recycling electronics and environmentally hazardous materials.

name: Seattle Compost Facility
description: Facility for compostable materials including food waste and yard debris.

name: Recycling & Disposal Services
description: Accepts mixed recyclables and metal scrap.

name: Recology King County - Shoreline Recycling Center
description: Recycling services for plastics, metals, and paper products.

name: University District Textiles Recycling
description: Specializes in textile recycling including clothing and fabrics.
